page.title: 11lst IMPRESSIONS OF GRIMSARGH
page.content: I have recently moved to Grimsargh from a village near Hull. Mt first impression was it was a minute village with nothing going on. But I was wrong.There was a garden party almost as soon as I arrived and a Field Day sometime later and people have told me that there are quite a few other village events. I'm surprised some people have any spare time. I think it has more vandalism than where I used to live. There was hardly any vandalism at all. The rec. is larger and the village hall is bigger as well. But although it is smaller, Grimsargh is just as good as where I used to live.
